prinshops.description: A JSON string containing an array of PrintShop objects.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The Admin entity to be registered.

parameters.name: printRequest
parameters.description: A JSON string containing the print request details. It must include 'printshops' (a list of print shop IDs) and 'files' (a map where each key is a filename and the value is an object containing a 'specs' list). Each spec object should include 'id' (printing schema ID), 'from' (starting page), and 'to' (ending page).

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: One or more PDF files to be printed. The filenames must match the keys provided in the 'files' map within the 'printRequest' JSON string.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: The PDF file(s) to print. The endpoint accepts multiple files uploaded in a multipart/form-data request.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: A list of print shop IDs to calculate budgets for.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username for the new consumer

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email address of the consumer

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The full name of the consumer

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: The latitude of the consumer's location

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: The longitude of the consumer's location

200.description: Updates the consumer information and returns a success status.

success.description: Indicates whether the update was successful.

401.description: Unauthorized - The user is not authenticated.

403.description: Forbidden - The user does not have the required permissions (ROLE_USER).

200.description: A JSON object containing the list of pending print requests and a success status.

success.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

200.description: A successful response returning the history of satisfied requests.

parameters.name: consumerID
parameters.description: the id of the consumer.
